item.title: Version 1.8.17
item.description:
NameQuick v1.8.17

üöÄ New Features

  • Unified Drag & Drop: Drag files anywhere into NameQuick to process them instantly. Your settings are saved for next time.
  • Managed Folders: Dragging a folder onto NameQuick automatically sets it as a Managed Folder. New folders are disabled by default, and ‚ÄúWatched Folders‚Äù are now clearly called ‚ÄúManaged Folders‚Äù.
  • AI Transcription: Audio transcription is now supported via Whisper (OpenAI).
  • Document Conversion: Rich-text (.rtf) documents are automatically converted to plain text for AI-based renaming.
  • More File Types: NameQuick now supports BMP, HEIF, WebP, MP3, WAV, FLAC, MP4, AVI, MOV, MD, HTML, JS, XML, and RTF files.
  • Confirmation Notifications: New non-blocking toast-style banners keep you informed without interruptions.
  • AI Model Selection: Improved model selection interface for Gemini and OpenAI. Select your preferred AI model per file type with smart fallback options and an automatic mode.

‚ú® Improvements

  • UI Enhancements:
    • Search bar relocated to sidebar for easier access
    • Consistent menu button styles throughout
    • Clearer, more helpful error messages
  • Better Settings:
    • Settings reorganized into clearer categories with improved help text
    • Option to toggle subfolder processing on/off
  • AI Stability:
    • Enhanced handling of API limits and automatic retries for timeouts
  • Improved reliability in processing large files and better error feedback overall.

üêû Fixes

  • AI provider no longer resets when both Gemini and OpenAI keys are configured.
  • Managed Folder handling of renamed files improved.
  • Resolved issues causing failed file detection and processing errors.
  • Fixed RTF conversion failures.
